1383.quoteText:
You and Weebly agree to submit to the
personal and exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located within San Francisco,
California
1383.title: This service does not force users into binding arbitration

tosdr.case: This service does not force users into binding arbitration
tosdr.tldr: Weebly settles disputes in court, not through binding arbitration.

4683.quoteText:

of Weebly to exercise or enforce any right or provision of these Terms shall
not constitute a waiver of such right or provision
4683.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

tosdr.case: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

4684.quoteText:
these Terms and the relationship between you
and Weebly shall be governed by the laws of the State of California without
regard to its conflict of law provisions
4684.title: The court of law governing the terms is in the State of California, US

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

4685.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
tosdr.tldr: The court of law for Weebly is located in the State of California, USA. The United States have implemented some laws that are detrimental to the privacy of users of US-American services, most noticeably the PATRIOT Act.
